I have big boobs so I got an XXL because I was worried about the size. It was awesome and fit perfectly! AKA not a boob shirt I suggest going up one or two sizes if you want the baggy look. Packaging was amazing, as well as the print (no misspellings in English, I have not checked the Japanese). It says that it is 100% cotton, but because the product is not from America and is a random brand I am not 100% sure. The fabric is thick and nice (not rough like Thrasher shirts :D), it kind of feels like my comforter to be honest. It also looks awesome when layered with long sleeve and other things (I already tried out an outfit despite not washing it yet 😅). I am giving the product a four star because I have not washed the shirt yet.

This cat t-shirt is SUPER comfortable, it looks and feels great, so far the print hasn't even smudged or moved after washing, although the front has a small black cat in a bag, while the back has the big design. I personally don't care about it too much as it's the basic design for any regular t-shirt, and regardless of its design it's still super comfy and well fitting, and my new favorite shirt in my whole wardrobe right now! The phrases on the back are just so adorable and silly, like one of them is "when I grow up I wanna be a dinosaur!" Or "grrr" or even "meoww", the design honestly kinda feels like a cat made it in the best way possible! I recommend buying this shirt one hundred percent it's amazing!

I ordered this because I needed an over sized shirt for sleep, and I like cats. That said I will wear this as a day shirt! It came, and as soon as my hand touched the fabric I was like OMG! 评论概述: bad quality image, good quality print and shirt itself.
评论详情: it’s a.. decent shirt i’d say. the shirt quality is good, and it’s very soft and comfortable! the only fluke i’d say is that the quality of the print is.. ehm, bad, to say the least. you can literally count the pixels- well not actually, but you get what i mean!! it’s very fuzzy (but still readable and stuff) but it looks like the print was stolen by some bigger corporation that makes this shirt. it’s like someone stole the image or took a low quality screenshot of a better or more popular listing and plastered that image onto this shirt. again, it’s comfortable and the image quality isn’t TOO BAD, it just icks me. if you’re looking for something comfortable to laze around the house in then it’s great. the print quality is excellent too! i’ve worn this shirt i’d say… three times now? not a single dent or wear in the print. i’ve bought shirts from official sellers before and there is a small problem i’ve found where after a few washes the print will wear down (take my OMORI “Release Energy!” t-shirt for example), but this lasted pretty well. the only problem is the actual image quality.

评论概述: Disappointed, just a normal tee shirt cut.
评论详情: It's just a normal tee shirt, nothing special. The pictures make it look like it’s cut differently than a normal tee, but it’s not. The printing does feel nice and appears to be good quality so there is that. It also runs small. It’s closer to a large on the smaller side, so you don’t even get that good baggy feel. There is a possibility that the sizing chart explained all of this but unfortunately, I did not have a CM measuring tape. This could have all been avoided with actual pictures of the shirt and not folded/altered pictures. The sad thing is I still would have probably purchased the shirt just for the cut print.
